mapper.insert: insert into client_sys_config (su_id, `name`, `key`, secret, url_path, address, db_name, db_type, oracle_type, db_charset, db_login_name, db_login_pw, db_ip, db_port, tab_pane, version, sync_status, update_time, create_time,sync_time, oracle_sid) values (#{suId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{key,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{secret,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{urlPath,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dbName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dbType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{oracleType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dbCharset,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dbLoginName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dbLoginPw,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dbIp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dbPort,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tabPane,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{version,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{syncStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},now(), #{oracleSid,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
